00020 #ifndef STANDARD_SEARCH_H
00021 #define STANDARD_SEARCH_H
00022 
00023 #include "common_search.h"
00024 #include "../system/system.h"
00025 
00026 namespace Controller
00027 {
00028 
00029 #include "VariableOrders.h"
00030 
00032   // These need the following functions:
00033   // Constructor that takes existing variable and value ordering
00034   // (Feel free to ignore the value ordering!)
00035   
00036   template<typename VarOrder, typename Variables, typename Propogator>
00037   inline void solve_loop(StateObj* stateObj, function<void (void)> next_search, VarOrder& order, Variables& v, Propogator prop, bool findOneSol)
00038   {
00039     // Don't corrupt the state the world came in with.
00040     world_push(stateObj);
00041     
00042     maybe_print_search_state(stateObj, "Node: ", v);
00043     D_ASSERT(getQueue(stateObj).isQueuesEmpty());
00044     while(true)
00045     {
00046       D_ASSERT(getQueue(stateObj).isQueuesEmpty());
00047       getState(stateObj).incrementNodeCount();
00048       if(do_checks(stateObj))
00049         throw EndOfSearch();
00050 
00051       // order.find_next_unassigned returns true if all variables assigned.
00052       if(order.find_next_unassigned())
00053       {
00054         // This function may escape from search if solution limit
00055         // has been reached.
00056         next_search();
00057         
00058         // This is not for overall solution counting, but auxillary variables.
00059         if(findOneSol) 
00060         {
00061           int search_depth = order.search_depth();
00062           for(int i = 0; i < search_depth; ++i)
00063             world_pop(stateObj);
00064           // One more to remove the initial save.
00065           order.reset();
00066           world_pop(stateObj);
00067           cout << "Solution Leaving" << endl;
00068           return;
00069         }
00070         
00071         // fail here to force backtracking.
00072         getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00073       }
00074       else
00075       {
00076         maybe_print_search_state(stateObj, "Node: ", v);
00077         world_push(stateObj);
00078         order.branch_left();
00079         prop(stateObj, v);
00080         D_ASSERT(getQueue(stateObj).isQueuesEmpty() || getState(stateObj).isFailed());
00081       }
00082 
00083       // Either search failed, or a solution was found.
00084       while(getState(stateObj).isFailed())
00085       {
00086         getState(stateObj).setFailed(false);
00087         if(order.finished_search())
00088         {
00089           order.reset();
00090           world_pop(stateObj);
00091           cout << "Search end leaving" << endl;
00092           return;
00093         }
00094         world_pop(stateObj);
00095         maybe_print_search_action(stateObj, "bt");
00096         order.branch_right();
00097         set_optimise_and_propagate_queue(stateObj);
00098       }
00099     }
00100   }
00101 
00102 }
00103 
00104 #endif
